column4: while attempting to make a dual boot system with 2 hard drives apparently the live cd didnt recognize the windows disk and now grub isn't working and the windows drive also displays a grub error when booting
how can i boot a windows drive that displays a grub error?  can i reinstall grub and hope that it sees windows
If you have a Windows Vista entry in your menu.lst fill grub should be able to boot it once you reload the MBR
